I agree with the sentiments expressed here.  I thnk t=
hat most of the
problem is related to the difference between writing unit t=
ests after
the code, and writing unit tests before the code.

My own person=
al epiphany about TDD came from reading Jeff Langr's
series of articles abo=
ut building an object-relational database
mapping layer. That can be found =
here:
http://langrsoft.com/dbtdd.shtml  (Thanks Jeff!)

Hope that helps som=
eone,
Nick


Minor nit:  It's nice come across an engineer that can write w=
ell, but
